title: I have had 2 pixle 2s and they both have and have had green lines threw the screen and are pixleated anf the current phone that i have when ever i plug ot in thk charge the phone it shuts off and it wont let me use it
content: I have talked with my provider and they replaced the phone with a small replacement fee and I am getting frustrated because both phones have not preformed as good as everyone had said.
